item.title: 电脑状态 休眠 睡眠 关机等区别
item.description: 👌 2021-04-22 电脑状态 休眠 睡眠 关机等区别 Suspend「待机」 Does not turn off your computer. It puts the computer and all peripherals on a low power consumption mode. If the battery runs out or the computer turns off for some reason, the current session and unsaved changes will be lost. 不关闭
